p: We observed no correlation between salivary gland virus titer (pfu/mL) and saliva virus titer (pfu/mL) for R99659 and LR2006 OPY1 viruses in Ae. aegypti (Poza Rica; Figure 4A). This was also true for the four Ae. albopictus strains infected with R99659 genotype ( Figure 4B) and the Florida and Louisiana Ae. albopictus strains infected with LR2006 OPY1 ( Figure 4C). However, the TER of the La RÃ©union Ae. albopictus strain infected with LR2006 OPY1 showed a positive correlation between salivary gland virus titer and saliva virus titer (correlation coefficient = 0.672). Although the New Jersey A. albopictus strain had a positive correlation between the two variables, it was weak and likely insignificant (correlation coefficient = 0.323; Figure 4C).
